EmailTemplate.description: Partner Info - Request for approving Addendum renewal
EmailTemplate.name: PartnerInfo Renew Addendum
EmailTemplate.subject: Request to Renew Negotiated Payment for {!Partner_Addendum__c.Licence__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Please approve the renewal of {!Partner_Addendum__c.Sub_Type__c} negotiated payment for Licence {!Partner_Addendum__c.Licence__c} for another year.
To approve or reject this item, click this link {!ApprovalRequest.External_URL}
Or reply to this email with one of these words in the first line of the email message: APPROVE, APPROVED, YES, REJECT, REJECTED, NO
regards,
